review: Great price for this item as well as availability prior to the holidays! The movies/series available has a great selection.
author: Jennifer Bradbury

review: We love our Fire TV Stick!
author: NJohnson

review: It does a whole lot. That is for sure. And the RF remote is amazing. I love the play/pause button for web content. 5 stars for being a great way to watch youtube, which I do quite a bit.However, I'm used to watching CBS shows on cbs.com. I can't find a CBS app that works, and if I try to watch CBS shows through amazon video they want me to pay. I'm not inherently against paying, but these shows are free on cbs.com. Ergo, I find myself preferring the old laptop and mouse setup over Fire TV stick... the very thing I was hoping it would replace. 1 star for having no browser and charging for free content. Also, I plugged the fire TV stick into the venerated power supply that came with it and it still whined to me about wanting more power. It works great, it's just whiny.Averaging 1 star and 5 stars = 3 stars.
author: Mike

review: Love it.  Has everything I wanted and more.  Can't think of any negatives at this point.
author: Gtbiv1

review: Well this is good. Just have a problem with the screen saver. Other than that this is really a good way of viewing many things on your TV, And even the App for the remote can be use from your compatible phone. It even stay at the last known position on the TV, when you turn the TV off.
author: Mr Leroy L Beavers Jr

review: firestick is very good. I like the interface very user friendly. The one thing that seems to be difficult is trying to cast things from your phone or tablet or laptop to the Amazon fire stick. It seems that there are barriers to let's say cast HBO GO to Amazon fire stick. I don't believe amazon has an HBO Go app so it seems they're trying to eliminate you being able to view HBO Go via another device by casting which chromecast does very well. Other than that there are many apps to download and use and it rivals Netflix if you have Amazon Prime.
author: Matt L.

review: Only thing it is missing is support for directv so that you can log in and watch their online content
